response.original_title: 音楽朗読劇『黒世界 〜リリーの永遠記憶探訪記、或いは、終わりなき繭期にまつわる寥々たる考察について〜』雨下の章
response.overview: “Let time stop, so that you can be beautiful forever…”  It was a dream of an eternal Cocoon.  At the end of that eternal Cocoon, the girl awoke from her dream and left the flower garden.  The real world to which the girl returns to is a desolate wasteland.  An endless journey. An eternal Cocoon. Seeking a death she cannot find.  As she wanders, the girl repeatedly encounters and parts ways with others.  Fourteen actors and seven playwrights weave together twelve stories of loneliness and madness.
response.title: 音楽朗読劇『黒世界 〜リリーの永遠記憶探訪記、或いは、終わりなき繭期にまつわる寥々たる考察について〜』雨下の章
